evolve.Title: Cannot Evolve
evolve.Body: You have no Pokemon currently able to evolve. Level your Pokemon up by fighting gym leaders using **/gymbattle** and wild Pokemon using **/spawn**.

pokeinfo.Title: No Results
pokeinfo.Body: The Pokemon you are trying to search for does not seem to exist. Try again using the given prompts and filters.

pokeinfo.Title: No Results
pokeinfo.Body: There seem to be no Pokemon categorized under the color {0}. Try again using the given prompts and filters.

pokeinfo.Title: No Results
pokeinfo.Body: There seem to be no Pokemon categorized under the type {0}. Try again using the given prompts and filters.
